### CatchSwitchInst() {#a03762c60c8818507ee050a6c7187918f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>CatchSwitchInst::CatchSwitchInst (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; ParentPad, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; UnwindDest, unsigned NumHandlers, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a> &amp; NameStr, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/insertposition">InsertPosition</a> InsertBefore)</>}>
Create a new switch instruction, specifying a default destination.

The number of additional handlers can be specified here to make memory allocation more efficient. This constructor can also autoinsert before another instruction.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instructions-h/#l04074">4074</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instructions-h">Instructions.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/instructions-cpp/#l01018">1018</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/instructions-cpp">Instructions.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### addHandler() {#a4b1438bbee79540a0cca9a2c018b71ec}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void CatchSwitchInst::addHandler (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; Dest)</>}>
Add an entry to the switch instruction... Note: This action invalidates <a href="#aaf71dcc496858ab263fec095ca47448a">handler&#95;end()</a>.

Old <a href="#aaf71dcc496858ab263fec095ca47448a">handler&#95;end()</a> iterator will point to the added handler.
